Flying, menace
When Ansur, the Waiting Storm enters, sacrifice it and mill four cards unless it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard.
You may cast Ansur from your graveyard by exiling three other creature cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.
Whenever Ansur deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a card exiled with it. If that card is an undead creature card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost instead.
